#summary Really easy to use Interface for using OpenAL to play 3D audio
#sidebar NavigationLibraries

== Features ==
 * Surround sound via OpenAL Soft
 * Device enumeration
 * Ogg/Vorbis & Wave file loading ( streamed )
 * Multichannel audio emitters
 * Directional speakers
 * Doppler effects
 * Soon environmental effects

== List of authors ==
 * Santo Pfingsten (TTK-Bandit)

== Includes ==
 * `<`[http://code.google.com/p/open-game-libraries/source/browse/trunk/Libraries/Include/og/Audio/AudioSystem.h og/Audio/AudioSystem.h]`>`
  * Includes everything needed

== Dependencies ==
 * [LibraryShared Shared]
 * [LibraryCommon Common]
 * [LibraryMath Math]
 * [http://www.vorbis.com/ libOgg / libVorbis]
 * [http://kcat.strangesoft.net/openal.html OpenAL Soft]
